message.raw:
Find OGRE in CMake also without pkg-config

Ogre 1.10 and the version of Ogre 1.9 shipped with vcpkg
(see https://github.com/Microsoft/vcpkg/blob/effbdfbb91e3672e41cfc442ce0244872b1fad8c/ports/ogre/OGREConfig.cmake) are shipping with a `OGREConfig.cmake`
that permits to Find OGRE in CMake without the use of pkg-config.

For now, only try to find OGRE using the `OGREConfig.cmake` if the pkg-config-based search of OGRE failed.

Furthermore, remove some outdated comment related to some closed Gazebo issues:
* #!/osrf/gazebo/issues/994
* #!/osrf/gazebo/issues/995

message:
Find OGRE in CMake also without pkg-config

Ogre 1.10 and the version of Ogre 1.9 shipped with vcpkg
(see https://github.com/Microsoft/vcpkg/blob/effbdfbb91e3672e41cfc442ce0244872b1fad8c/ports/ogre/OGREConfig.cmake) are shipping with a `OGREConfig.cmake`
that permits to Find OGRE in CMake without the use of pkg-config.

For now, only try to find OGRE using the `OGREConfig.cmake` if the pkg-config-based search of OGRE failed.

Furthermore, remove some outdated comment related to some closed Gazebo issues:
* #!/osrf/gazebo/issues/994
* #!/osrf/gazebo/issues/995
